entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -24.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -27.8°C
Wind: E 67 km/h gust 83 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except 80 gusting to 100 near the Richardson mountains this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Ogilvie mountains. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023
